definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: Thirteen is much different from thirty.
sentences.chinese: 十叁和叁十是很不相同的。

sentences.english: The woman is thirty years old, this is the most attractive rose, the age of maturity and charming.
sentences.chinese: 女忍叁拾岁湜玫瑰，哲湜最犹魅力得年龄，成熟迷忍。

sentences.english: Three episodes have been telescoped into a single programme.
sentences.chinese: 把叁集的内容压缩成了一个节目。

sentences.english: He already has three grandchildren around him everyday.
sentences.chinese: 现在已经有叁个孙子每天围绕在他身边。

sentences.english: She's had three husbands and I'll be an old maid.
sentences.chinese: 她有过叁个丈夫，而我要变成一个老处女了。

sentences.english: These plans were well rehearsed, involving banks and other financial infrastructure providers.
sentences.chinese: 各银行及金融基础设施供应商均积极叁与计划的演习。

sentences.english: This year sees the tercentenary of Handel's birth.
sentences.chinese: 今年是韩德尔诞辰叁百周年。

sentences.english: Time was you could get a good three-course meal for less than a pound.
sentences.chinese: 那年头吃一顿叁道菜的好饭还花不了一英镑。

sentences.english: Each of the recitals are incorporated herein by reference as if fully set forth herein.
sentences.chinese: 好像完全在此发表，每一个背诵在此被叁考所吸收。

sentences.english: Melkert spoke during a news conference in Baghdad Wednesday.
sentences.chinese: 梅尔克特星期叁在巴格达的一次记者会上说的这番话。

sentences.english: Be responsible for CMM, ensure factuality of the measurement result.
sentences.chinese: 负责叁坐标测量，确保测量结果的真实性。

sentences.english: We also call it the 30th day of the old year.

definition: you (informal, as opposed to courteous 您[nin2])
article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)
